titleStmt.title: Dauids learning, or The vvay to true happinesse in a commentarie vpon the 32. Psalme. Preached and now published by T.T. late fellow of Christs Colledge in Cambridge. To which is prefixed the table of method of the whole Psalme, and annexed an alphabeticall table of the chiefe matters in the commentarie.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

titleStmt.title: Dauids learning, or The vvay to true happinesse in a commentarie vpon the 32. Psalme. Preached and now published by T.T. late fellow of Christs Colledge in Cambridge. To which is prefixed the table of method of the whole Psalme, and annexed an alphabeticall table of the chiefe matters in the commentarie.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Henrie Fetherstone, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Rose,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The high-way to happines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
